data.title: Iván ARGOTE - Artist - Perrotin
data.meta_description: Iván Argote creates videos, photographs, sculpture, public interventions and performances, as a way to explore our inextricable links to history, tradition, art, politics and power. Discover Iván Argote at Perrotin
